author: jdillon
msg: (GERONIMO-2229) Enable uddi configs for m2 build

author: danj
msg: Refactored router persistence layer to a) generalize default persistence code and reuse it for capabilities
where applicable, and b) rely on generic persistence initialization (from the deployment descriptor).

author: danj
msg: Fix: searchClassHierarchy() was not returning the search result if a parent class was found
to meet the type requirement of a serializer. The method was finding the result, but never
checking to see if it was not null and returning it!

author: danj
msg: Added the interface and getter/setter necessary to allow capabilities to have their own
individual persistence mechanisms, not just the router. The router persistence will only
handle the EPR -> instance entries, not the state of the capabilities.

author: danj
msg: Updated descriptor definition of persistence - the persistence location is now specified
concretely (not as an init param), and the persistence element can be added to each
